scripts.test: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/2test.spec.js'; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:run: npm run prereport && npx cypress run
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run cypress:run; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.cy:run_spec: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/2test.spec.js'; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge; --record --key f14b6f35-801a-4b0b-87ee-345aebb9babd
scripts.cy:run_para_e2e: npm run cy:run_e2e --browser firefox --ci-build-id 1 & npm run cy:run_e2e --browser chrome --ci-build-id 1
scripts.cy:run_para_spec: npm run cy:run_spec --record --key f14b6f35-801a-4b0b-87ee-345aebb9babd --browser chrome --group chrome  & npm run cy:run_spec --record --key f14b6f35-801a-4b0b-87ee-345aebb9babd --browser electron --group electron
scripts.browsers: npm run cySpec & npm run cyWebKit & npm run chromeTest
scripts.cy:run_browser: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/2test.spec.js' --browser firefox & npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/inv.spec.js' --browser chrome
